per_frame_1=// Black Rebel Motorcycle Club - Lien On Your Dreams
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=bass_thresh = above(bass_att,bass_thresh)*2 + (1-above(bass_att,bass_thresh))*((bass_thresh-1.3)*0.91+1.3);
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=vol = 0.1*(vol*9 + (bass_att+mid_att+treb_att)*0.333333);
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=mtime = mtime+vol*0.1;
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=q10 = mtime*0.1;
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=q1 = time*0.44;
per_frame_12=q2 = time*0.32;
per_frame_13=q3 = time*0.285;
per_frame_14=q7 = time*0.1;
per_frame_15=
per_frame_16=q4 = 0.2*sin(time*0.4);
per_frame_17=q5 = 0.2*cos(time*0.634);
per_frame_18=q6 = -0.2*sin(time*0.58);
per_frame_19=
per_frame_20=//sy = sy + vol;
per_frame_21=
per_frame_22=beat = equal(bass_thresh, 2)*1 + (1-equal(bass_thresh, 2))*beat*0.95;
per_frame_23=q8 = beat;
per_frame_24=monitor=beat;
warp_1=`sampler sampler_fire_base;
warp_2=`sampler sampler_fire_dis4;
warp_3=`sampler sampler_fire_alpha5;
warp_4=`sampler sampler_fire_alpha8;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`shader_body
warp_7=`{
warp_8=`    //ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
warp_9=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_fire_base, float2(uv.x, uv.y)).xyz;
warp_10=`    
warp_11=`    float3 fire = tex2D(sampler_fire_dis4, float2(uv.x+q4, uv.y+q2)).xyz;
warp_12=`    fire += tex2D(sampler_fire_dis4, float2(uv.x+q5, uv.y+q3)).xyz; 
warp_13=`    fire += tex2D(sampler_fire_dis4, float2(uv.x+q6, uv.y+q1)).xyz;
warp_14=`    
warp_15=`    ret *= fire;
warp_16=`    float3 a2 = tex2D(sampler_fire_alpha8, float2(uv.x, uv.y)).xyz;
warp_17=`    
warp_18=`    ret *= a2;
warp_19=`    
warp_20=`    ret *= 1; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_21=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 sam = tex2D(sampler_main, uv);
comp_4=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, float2(uv.x, uv.y));
comp_5=`    sam *= GetBlur1(uv)-GetBlur3(uv);       
comp_6=`    sam *=1;
comp_7=`
comp_8=`    float3 reta = tex2D(sampler_main, sam+uv ).xyz;
comp_9=`    ret = reta.x * reta + (reta.x)*ret;
comp_10=`    ret *= 2; //gamma
comp_11=`    //ret *= ret; //darken
comp_12=`}
